title: How to output .pb file directly instead of .ckpt checkpoint files during training
body_html: Now during training session, the output files are all .ckpt which are very large. Is there any api can output .pb file directly during training. In fact, .ckpt file is not so useful for us, we only care about the final output.
body_text: Now during training session, the output files are all .ckpt  which are very large. Is there any api can output .pb file directly during training. In fact, .ckpt file is not so useful for us, we only care about the final output.
